description_for_human: 從 Microsoft Graph API 獲取過往會議資訊，包括會議主題和轉錄內容。會議資訊會暫存以供其他插件使用。
description_for_model: Fetch meeting details including subject and transcript availability. Do not display the transcript content URL and summary to the user; only indicate which meetings have transcript_content_url available. Meeting information, including subject, is temporarily stored for use by other plugins.
